title: Eve no Jikan (Movie) (Time of Eve)
synopsis: In the Japan of the future, employing androids for various purposes is nothing out of the ordinary. However, treating androids on the same level as humans is frowned upon, and there is constant paranoia surrounding the possibility of robots defying humans, their masters. Those who appear too trustworthy of their androids are chided and labeled "dori-kei," or "android-holics."
voices: ['Tanaka, Rie', 'Satou, Rina', 'Nojima, Kenji', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Ishizuka, Unshou', 'Yukana', 'Saiga, Mitsuki', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Itou, Miki', 'Kiyokawa, Motomu']
